php.LBL_ENTER: It enables/disables sending messages after pressing ENTER
php.LBL_ROOM_DESCRIPTION_CRM: Chat rooms list with records marked as favorites
php.LBL_ROOM_DESCRIPTION_GROUP: Chat rooms list with user groups
php.LBL_ROOM_DESCRIPTION_GLOBAL: Chat rooms list visible for all users
php.LBL_CHAT_USER_SWITCHED: Chat is inactive if you switched to another user.
